Text:
Better than nothing.  

2HD is a shit group who capped 2 episodes then stopped. 

Thanks for the up!
Thanks for coming to our rescue

duckdown-
2HD is an amazing group. Show some proof of what you've capped before slamming someone else.  I notice you've uploaded a grand total of ZERO torrents to this site. 

The problem is that Slice doesn't broadcast in HD.  The scene hates non-HD channels. Can't blame them.  It's like 'why bother?'.
i don't think 2HD is shit, but still, enough people want the show that they shouldn't stop capping after they've started.
quality is poor. I will seed but the quality stinks, not watchable.
it's not unwatchable, if you have vlc player change the ratio to 4:3.

I didn't upload this to discredit anyone who uploads.. I really only upload shows when they have not been posted a day or two after they aired.. I ended up finding this on Filestube. I know the quality sucks.. but Im all about instant gratification and couldnt wait. LOL
